mapper.select: SELECT qa.*, a.advert_sdate AS last_advert_sdate, a.advert_edate AS last_advert_edate FROM qrboard_area qa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT qrboard_area_idx, advert_sdate, advert_edate FROM advert WHERE advert_state IN (0,1) ORDER BY advert_edate DESC LIMIT 1 ) a ON qa.qrboard_area_idx = a.qrboard_area_idx WHERE qa.qrboard_idx = #{qrboardIdx} ORDER BY qa.qrboard_area_seq
